title: Over by Christmas, 1914
brief_description: Part of the Time to remember series. Deals with the year 1914 in Western Europe and the outbreak of hostilities in World War I. Includes images of Prince Albert, King George, King Wilheim, Queen Mary, Nicholas (Czar of Russia), the President of France and archival footage.
